import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Chart as ChartJS, ArcElement, Tooltip, Legend } from 'chart.js'; import { Pie } from 'react-chartjs-2'; import './app.css' ChartJS.register(ArcElement, Tooltip, Legend); export const data = { labels: ['Renda Fixa', 'Renda VariÃ¡vel'], datasets: [ { label: `invista aqui: R$`, data: [3100,1600], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.3)', 'rgba(0, 0, 250, 0.3)', ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)', ], borderWidth: 1, }, ], }; export function Grafico() { return ; } function CdbInput() { const [investimentos, setInvestimentos] = useState({ cdb1: 0, cdb2: 0, cdb3: 0, acao1: 0, acao2: 0, acao3: 0 }); const handleInputChange = (event, cdbName) => { const { value } = event.target; setInvestimentos(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [cdbName]: value })); }; var cdb01 = document.getElementById("cdb1") const AlterarInput = (check, input) =>{ check.checked === true ? input.disabled = false : input.disabled = true input.disabled ? input.value = '' : input.value = input.value } return (
